page.title: 07CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content:
ONE SIDE HAS TO SAY "RED ROVER, RED ROVER,LET SO AND SO(A CHILD IS NAMED) COME OVER. THE NAMED CHILD HAS TO COME OVER TO THE OTHER SIDE AND TRY AND BREAK THROUGH TWO PEOPLE'S HANDS. IF THEY BREAK THROUGH THAT CERTAIN COUPLE'S HANDS THEY GO BACK TO THEIR OWN SIDE.IF THEY DON'T BREAK THROUGH WITHIN A COUNT OF TEN THEY STAY AND JOIN THE SIDE THEY ARE TRYING TO BREAK THROUGH. EACH SIDE TAKES IT IN TURNS TO SAY,"RED ROVER ETC" UNTIL THERE IS ONLY ONE PERSON LEFT ON ONE SIDE.THEN THE GAME IS ENDED.
{KNOCKOUT}. KNOCKOUT IS ANOTHER GAME AT THIS SCHOOL.IT IS A FOOTBALL GAME. YOU NEED TEN PLAYERS (INCLUDING THE GOALKEEPER) YOU START OFF WITH THE GOALKEEPER THROWING THE BALL TO THE PLAYERS. THE PLAYERS HAVE TO TRY AND SCORE BY
